title: [Health] 9 year study reveals the lasting effects childhood trauma/maltreatment has on adult relationships (n=2000)

[Medicine] A tabletop device that can ‘inhale’ nicotine-laden vapour could help to explain why some e-cigarettes cause grave lung injury. Vaping devices, which can produce a nicotine-laced vapour, have been linked to more than 2,500 hospitalizations and dozens of deaths in the United States alone.
